meanings.definition: A type of grass that grows in coastal areas.
meanings.sent1: The cordgrasses swayed gently in the coastal breeze.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the different types of cordgrasses during our beach field trip.
meanings.sent3: The cordgrasses whispered secrets to the seagulls passing by.
meanings.sent4: The cordgrasses stood tall like guardians of the shore.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green cordgrasses painted a beautiful picture along the coastline.
